Package com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.hbase

Contains the Honeycomb backend for HBase.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
HBaseTableFactory Creates Tables backed by HBase
 

Class Summary
HBaseMetadata Manages writing and reading table & column schemas, table & column ids, and row & autoincrement counters to and from HBase.
HBaseModule Wires up the required classes for the HBase backend
HBaseOperations Encapsulate HBase actions such as Get, Put and Delete
HBaseScanner Iterates through HBase rows
HBaseStore An HBase backed Store
HBaseTable An HBase backed Table
HTableFactory Constructs new HTables
HTableProvider Constructs new HTableInterface instances from a pool.
MetadataCache Caches metadata about tables to reduce HBase lookups.
MutationFactory Creates put and deleteRow lists for various operations.
TableCreator Creates the HTable used by Honeycomb
VarEncoder Helper functions for variable length encoding data in a binary-sort safe manner.
 

Package com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.hbase Description

Contains the Honeycomb backend for HBase.
